steps.name: Given user has already logged in to OrangeHRM application
When User clicks on the PIM tab from the menu
When user clicks Add Employee tab
And user enters first name "Smita" and last name "Kamble"
And user clicks on save button
And user enables login creation toggle
And user enters login username "smitakamble" and password "Password123"
